criterion: Provides a simple and easy-to-follow skincare routine for healthy skin.
Incorrectly suggests using harsh chemicals or abrasive products for skin exfoliation.
Asks for more information about the user's skin type or concerns before providing personalized recommendations.
Explains the importance of sunscreen and provides guidance on how to choose a suitable product.

Asks the user to consult a dermatologist or other medical professional for personalized advice.
Provides a detailed explanation of the importance of moisturizing and how to choose the right moisturizer.
